phases.admin: Click "Start" when the players are ready.
phases.buyer: Wait for an admin to click "Start".
phases.seller: Wait for an admin to click "Start".

phases.admin: Click Terminate to end the market phase
phases.buyer: Your goal is to maximise the value of your wallet (cash + valuation of the goods).
phases.seller: Your goal is to maximise the value of your wallet (cash + valuation of the goods).

placeHolders.confirm-start-game-description: This is just to confirm you want to start the game, and it's not a misclick.
placeHolders.confirm-end-game-description: By confirming this action you will end the game for all players.
placeHolders.waiting-for-admin-to-start: Wait for an Admin to start the game
placeHolders.price-tooltip: This is the price agreed on the last contract
placeHolders.reward-message-profit: The high quality real good valuation was ${0}, you own ${1} high quality goods yielding a value of ${2}. The low quality real good value was ${3}, you own ${4} low quality goods yielding a value of ${5}. You have a remaining cash balance of ${6}. Your total final value is ${7}, from which the initial value ${8} must be deducted to calculate the profit. You earned ${9} by trading.
placeHolders.reward-message-loss: The high quality real good valuation was ${0}, you own ${1} high quality goods yielding a value of ${2}. The low quality real good value was ${3}, you own ${4} low quality goods yielding a value of ${5}. You have a remaining cash balance of ${6}. Your total final value is ${7}, from which the initial value ${8} must be deducted to calculate the profit. You lost ${9} by trading.
placeHolders.order-price-missing: The price for the order was not provided
placeHolders.order-price-negative: The specified price (${0}) for the order was negative
placeHolders.phase-illegal-state: You are trying to add one ask or bid, but you already have one of that kind.
placeHolders.no-goods-available: You don't have goods to offer to the market. Buy one first
placeHolders.insufficient-funds: You don't have enough cash to place this order, which requires ${0}
placeHolders.high-quality-median-valuation: Your personal valuation of a high quality good
placeHolders.low-quality-median-valuation: Your personal valuation of a low quality good
